title: How precise is precise
creator_credit: Rodney Musch, Philip Law and Tasmania. Dept. of Film Production
brief_description: The Hobart Science Centre specialises in the production of some intricate instruments which are used in various industries and laboratories in Australia and overseas. Describes some of the activities and processes conducted by the centre.
